alert.note: Alert for Jones; Lyman (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 7:46AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Jones and west central Lyman Counties through 915 AM CDT... At 846 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Vivian, or 12 miles west of Presho, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... 5 Mile Corner around 900 AM CDT. Presho around 905 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Earling Hill and Fate Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
